annotation.spannedText: An adverse reaction to a rabies vaccine may exact a high price – to your dog’s health and your wallet

classMention.mentionClass: An adverse reaction to a rabies vaccine may exact a high price – to your dog’s health and your wallet

annotation.spannedText: Learn to recognize adverse reactions

classMention.mentionClass: Learn to recognize adverse reactions

annotation.spannedText: If you suspect a health or behavior problem may be connected to a vaccine, you may have to convince your vet

classMention.mentionClass: If you suspect a health or behavior problem may be connected to a vaccine, you may have to convince your vet

annotation.spannedText: It’s common to hear “it couldn’t be the shot” or “a reaction like that is impossible

classMention.mentionClass: It’s common to hear “it couldn’t be the shot” or “a reaction like that is impossible

annotation.spannedText: Even the drug’s manufacturer (to whom you should immediately report the reaction — giving them the brand and lot# — may deny the connection

classMention.mentionClass: Even the drug’s manufacturer (to whom you should immediately report the reaction — giving them the brand and lot# — may deny the connection

annotation.spannedText: Insist on seeing the product’s package insert

classMention.mentionClass: Insist on seeing the product’s package insert

annotation.spannedText: Also know that long-term reactions aren’t usually documented or even studied

classMention.mentionClass: Also know that long-term reactions aren’t usually documented or even studied

annotation.spannedText: Vaccinate healthy dogs only

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccinate healthy dogs only

annotation.spannedText: This is especially dangerous as you may presume immunity that does not exist

classMention.mentionClass: This is especially dangerous as you may presume immunity that does not exist

annotation.spannedText: Pets with autoimmune disease or cancer are obviously “not healthy,” but neither are pets suffering from stress from a move or surgery, a virus or infection, or allergies or skin problems or any other condition compromising health

classMention.mentionClass: Pets with autoimmune disease or cancer are obviously “not healthy,” but neither are pets suffering from stress from a move or surgery, a virus or infection, or allergies or skin problems or any other condition compromising health

annotation.spannedText: Never allow your pet to be vaccinated during surgery

classMention.mentionClass: Never allow your pet to be vaccinated during surgery

annotation.spannedText: Ask for a rabies vaccination exemption

classMention.mentionClass: Ask for a rabies vaccination exemption

annotation.spannedText: If your dog has documented health problems, ask your vet to apply for a rabies vaccination extension or exemption

classMention.mentionClass: If your dog has documented health problems, ask your vet to apply for a rabies vaccination extension or exemption

annotation.spannedText: If your vet won’t apply for an exemption, go elsewhere

classMention.mentionClass: If your vet won’t apply for an exemption, go elsewhere

annotation.spannedText: If local law forbids exemptions, change the law

classMention.mentionClass: If local law forbids exemptions, change the law

annotation.spannedText: Don’t vaccinate against rabies within three weeks of other vaccinations or medication for parasites

classMention.mentionClass: Don’t vaccinate against rabies within three weeks of other vaccinations or medication for parasites

annotation.spannedText: Multiple vaccines given at once greatly increase the chance of reactions

classMention.mentionClass: Multiple vaccines given at once greatly increase the chance of reactions

annotation.spannedText: Multiple vaccines are especially risky for small dogs

classMention.mentionClass: Multiple vaccines are especially risky for small dogs

annotation.spannedText: Make sure your dog gets the correct vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: Make sure your dog gets the correct vaccine

annotation.spannedText: If you’re vaccinating a puppy, make sure your vet administers a one-year vaccine initially (as late as legally possible) and a three-year vaccine (or whatever is required in your area) thereafter

classMention.mentionClass: If you’re vaccinating a puppy, make sure your vet administers a one-year vaccine initially (as late as legally possible) and a three-year vaccine (or whatever is required in your area) thereafter

annotation.spannedText: A one-year shot must be followed by re-vaccination a year later

classMention.mentionClass: A one-year shot must be followed by re-vaccination a year later

annotation.spannedText: Vaccinate at the safest time

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccinate at the safest time

annotation.spannedText: Vaccinate in the morning, early in the week, and don’t leave the area for at least an hour if possible

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccinate in the morning, early in the week, and don’t leave the area for at least an hour if possible

annotation.spannedText: Watch for reactions for at least the next 48 hours

classMention.mentionClass: Watch for reactions for at least the next 48 hours

annotation.spannedText: Tell your vet you want a Thimerosol-free vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: Tell your vet you want a Thimerosol-free vaccine

annotation.spannedText: Find a vet trained in homeopathy to vaccinate your dog

classMention.mentionClass: Find a vet trained in homeopathy to vaccinate your dog

annotation.spannedText: Certain homeopathic remedies given before, during and after vaccinating can lessen the chance of ill effects from vaccination

classMention.mentionClass: Certain homeopathic remedies given before, during and after vaccinating can lessen the chance of ill effects from vaccination

annotation.spannedText: Report all vaccine reactions to your vet and make sure they’re recorded in your pet’s file

classMention.mentionClass: Report all vaccine reactions to your vet and make sure they’re recorded in your pet’s file

annotation.spannedText: Have the vet sign relevant pages, get copies and put them in a safe place

classMention.mentionClass: Have the vet sign relevant pages, get copies and put them in a safe place

annotation.spannedText: Also report the reaction to the drug’s manufacturer

classMention.mentionClass: Also report the reaction to the drug’s manufacturer

annotation.spannedText: Vets are notoriously bad at reporting reactions, but exemptions to rabies vaccination and drug safety require documentation

classMention.mentionClass: Vets are notoriously bad at reporting reactions, but exemptions to rabies vaccination and drug safety require documentation

annotation.spannedText: Don’t vaccinate within a week of travel

classMention.mentionClass: Don’t vaccinate within a week of travel

annotation.spannedText: Keep copies of vaccination records and titer tests in your car(s) and license tags on your dog’s collar or harness

classMention.mentionClass: Keep copies of vaccination records and titer tests in your car(s) and license tags on your dog’s collar or harness

annotation.spannedText: Do not administer a rabies vaccine yourself

classMention.mentionClass: Do not administer a rabies vaccine yourself

annotation.spannedText: It will not satisfy legal requirements and you’ll have to have a vet vaccinate again

classMention.mentionClass: It will not satisfy legal requirements and you’ll have to have a vet vaccinate again

annotation.spannedText: You will also be unprepared to deal with a potentially life-threatening reaction

classMention.mentionClass: You will also be unprepared to deal with a potentially life-threatening reaction

annotation.spannedText: a vet’s office may likely be a safer place to get the vaccine than a mobile clinic

classMention.mentionClass: a vet’s office may likely be a safer place to get the vaccine than a mobile clinic

annotation.spannedText: Support the Rabies Challenge Fund

classMention.mentionClass: Support the Rabies Challenge Fund

annotation.spannedText: Before the next notice from Animal Control arrives, do your homework

classMention.mentionClass: Before the next notice from Animal Control arrives, do your homework

annotation.spannedText: A little time spent learning about the rabies vaccine can mean the difference between your dog’s wellness and serious illness

classMention.mentionClass: A little time spent learning about the rabies vaccine can mean the difference between your dog’s wellness and serious illness
